Articles.Content: I have a lot of mods, so it's hard to know which if any is causing this, but the reentry effects now has this large screen filling flar that seems to center at the front of the craft but fill the screen even when zoomed out.

Stock has reentry effects. I didn't add any mods for reentry effects unless it was bundled with another mod. I have RealPlume, but I've had it for some time:

Spoiler

I managed to get a couple of screen shots:

Nothing to do with mods, this is a stock thing. Struts cause this (and possibly fuel lines, since they use the same compound part/endpoint technique).

The exact circumstances are not entirely clear but it seems to happen most often with struts that have lost their endpoint. It's been subject of other threads already a few times.

Edited August 27, 2017 by swjr-swis
fuel lines too

Spoiler



 

Well that's what I have since 1.3
